description: The Otis Ridge Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Otis Ridge for the snow report
Alexa, ask Otis Ridge for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Otis Ridge icon
name: Snow Report for Otis Ridge
shortDescription: The Otis Ridge Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Otis Ridge.
